name: ox2d
description: A 2D canvas game framework with a tiny size but a big heart.

scripts.start: npm run server & npm run watch & npm run watchify
scripts.watch: npm run watchImageAssets & npm run watchDataAssets & npm run watchEntities & npm run watchScenes & npm run watchAudioAssets
scripts.watchAssets: npm run watchImageAssets & npm run watchDataAssets
scripts.deploy: npm run assets && npm run scenes && npm run entities && npm run build && uglifyjs ./ox.js -mc -o game.js

author: Otto Robba
